content: spooky pumpkin mitts by catinasweater yarn i recommend fingering weight woolen spun yarn i used holst garn supersoft you can use 2 or 3 different colors you ll need approximately 30-50 g of yarn needle / gauge i used 2 5 mm needles us 1 5 and got a gauge of 34 st / 10 cm 4 this gives me a hand circumference of 19 cm 7 5 to make bigger or smaller mitts choose a different needle size to get a bigger or smaller gauge instructions 1 cuff cast on 60 stitches i recommend the old norwegian cast on knit 20 rounds of ribbing i chose a 1x1 twisted rib but you can also knit a regular 2x2 rib 2 colorwork chart knit stranded colorwork according to the charts below i recommend that you catch your floats if they are longer than 5 stitches these instructions correspond to chart 1 chart 2 works exactly the same way only mirrored rounds 1-13 knit all the stitches round 14 knit 17 stitches make 1 right knit 5 stitches make 1 left knit the remaining stitches 62 st rounds 15-16 knit all the stitches round 17 knit 17 stitches make 1 right knit 7 stitches make 1 left knit the remaining stitches 64 st rounds 18-19 knit all the stitches round 20 knit 17 stitches make 1 right knit 9 stitches make 1 left knit the remaining stitches 66 st rounds 21-23 knit all the stitches round 24 knit 17 stitches make 1 right knit 11 stitches make 1 left knit the remaining stitches 68 st rounds 25-27 knit all the stitches round 28 knit 17 stitches put the next 13 stitches on a piece of scrap yarn cast on 12 stitches according to the chart i recommend the reverse loop cast on knit the remaining stitches 67 st rounds 29-51 knit all the stitches 3 ribbing and finishing if you want to knit a 1x1 rib knit 1 round and decrease 1 stitch to get a total of 66 stitches if you want to knit a 2x2 rib knit 1 round and evenly decrease 3 stitches to get a total of 64 stitches knit 5 rounds of ribbing and bind off optionally you can bind off with an i-cord in a different color using a smaller needle size for the i-cord can help to tighten the upper edge of the mitts 4 thumb pick up 12 stitches along the reverse loop cast on edge put the 13 stitches from the scrap yarn on a needle knit 1 round and decrease 1 stitch to get a total of 24 stitches knit 5 rounds of ribbing and bind off optionally you can bind off with an i-cord use a piece of scrap yarn to sew shut any hole that might have formed at the corners of the thumb chart 1 left hand chart 2 right hand
